params._newAdmin: The address of the new admin.

params._admins: The list of admins to be added.

params._sovAmount: The amount of SOV to be added to the locked balance.
params._userAddress: The user whose locked balance has to be updated with _sovAmount.

params._addr: The address of the user to check the locked balance.

getLockedBalance(address).return: _balance The locked balance of the address `_addr`.

params._adminToRemove: The address of the admin which should be removed.

addAdmin(address).notice: The function to add a new admin.

depositSOV(address,uint256).notice: Adds SOV to the locked balance of a user.

getLockedBalance(address).notice: The function to get the locked balance of a user.

removeAdmin(address).notice: The function to remove an admin.
